archimate:Capability.name: Resource Test Lifecycle Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Resource Test Lifecycle Management applications provides the necessary functionality to manage the end-to-end lifecycle of a test of a resource.

properties.value: Management of resource test head capacity Management of resource test results Management of resource testing rules Reporting of resource test results Resource end to end test configuration setting up and tearing down Resource end to end test execution Resource end to end test results interpretation Resource end to end test scheduling Resource test resources acquisition and management Retrieval of appropriate resource inventory data
